Gift box includes knitted and embroidered Percy Pig™ designs. All feature the Percy Pig™ logo on the soles and contrast heels and toes. \\n M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
items.name: 5pk Percy Pig™ Socks Gift Box
